summary: REQ-1 is not implemented: both ICP and non-ICP Home pages still use hardcoded hero image asset paths (now image-6/7/8) rather than dynamically showing the last 3 user-uploaded images. The diff also introduces/updates unrelated project metadata and a broad frontend change summary not requested in the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the three Home page hero section images with the last 3 images the user uploaded (in both ICP and non-ICP Home pages), replacing the currently hardcoded heroImages sources.
missing_requirements.reason: Both HomePage files still define a static `heroImages` array with fixed `/assets/image-6.png`, `/assets/image-7.png`, `/assets/image-8.png` sources; there is no evidence of fetching/deriving the last 3 uploaded images or wiring them into the hero section.

missing_requirements.requirement: No broken images (no 404s) in the hero section for either ICP or non-ICP builds using the newly provided last-3 uploaded images.
missing_requirements.reason: Because the hero is not wired to the 'last 3 uploaded images' at all (still static assets), the acceptance criterion about using the newly provided uploads cannot be verified/fulfilled from the diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Project state tracking update describing rebuild/deploy workflow and new feature requests AR-1/AR-2 marked pending.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to update hero image sources; it does not request adding/updating a project tracking/state file.

hallucinated_features.description: Large set of unrelated frontend changes described (new routes like /control/site-settings, layout/header/footer changes, global typography changes, many page redesigns, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly prohibit changing layout/styling/animations beyond updating hero image sources; these described changes are unrelated to REQ-1 and not requested.
